com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager

Class FemWrapperDeserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.FilesystemEntityManager.FemWrapperDeserializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<FemWrapper>

    public class FemWrapperDeserializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<FemWrapper>
    This class allows Gson to deserialize the instances of the generic class FemWrapper This is achieved through the use of a ThreadLocal variable that holds the type of the object wrapped by the wrapper. This local ThreadLocal variable is set before deserializing FemWrappers using Gson and unset afterwards.
    Author:
    simon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FemWrapperDeserializer(LocalType localType)
      Create the wrapper deserializer setting the ThreadLocal variable to identify the type of the wrapped object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FemWrapper deserialize(com.google.gson.JsonElement je, java.lang.reflect.Type respT, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializationContext jdc)
      Deserialize the object wrapper deserializing the wrapped object as the type identified by the ThreadLocal passed into this instance when it was created.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Create the wrapper deserializer setting the ThreadLocal variable to identify the type of the wrapped object.
        Parameters:
        localType - The ThreadLocal<Type> that provides the type of the wrapped object. The value of this ThreadLocal must be set prior to deserializing the wrqpper through Gson
